## BlockPolledStabilioStore class

Ethers-based [StabilioStore](./lib-base.stabiliostore.md) that updates state whenever there's a new block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BlockPolledStabilioStore extends StabilioStore<BlockPolledStabilioStoreExtraState> 
```
